name: Tanuj Gupta
aboutText: Aspiring individual having 6+ years experience in B2B: Business Development -> client acquisitions, client relationships, account management, Revenue generation, P&L management. Value addition in entreprenuership & team handling Vision & a goal oriented persona looking for timely learnings & growth Willing to hold a strong experience & knowledge of various domains ( Multidimensional expertise)

experienceData.title: Enterprise Sales Manager
experienceData.description:
Conversational AI (Lead Capture & engage + AI powered lead nurturing automation)

We build - Website+Whatsapp+Facebook+Instagram+Google Business AI virtual assistants

•Responsible for building & developing education vertical
•B2B - Pitching, selling SaaS + Conversational AI solutions to client partners
•Provide feedback, suggestions for product upgrade & enrichment to the product team
•Revenue generation, client acquisitions & client retention

experienceData.title: Cluster Head (Sales & Operations)
experienceData.description:
OYO: Managed OYO's Wz division ->
•Held responsible for managing sales team of 10 members Managed both B2B as well as B2C side of the business
•Clocked MoM GMV ranging from INR 90,00,000 to INR 1.2 cr from B2C side
•Managed P&L of the assigned cluster
•Ensured on-boarding of high GMV valued hotels for B2B side
•Had quickly topped the charts as one of the top performing CH in Pune

experienceData.title: Sr Manager - Business Development (Partnerships)
experienceData.description:
Dexter Health India: Managed Mumbai & Rest of Maharashtra Identified and finalized distributors/suppliers, negotiated terms and commissions, and managed categories of healthcare and surgical products ( Wheelchairs, Adult Diapers, Walking Aids) Acquired institutional deals with hospitals and nursing homes for small to mid-size segments over annual contracts and successfully achieved quarterly targets Achieved quarterly target of minimum 10 Hospitals/Nursing homes ( Mid size segments) across…
